PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1994-16401994-10-040ISTC,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Industry, Science and Technology of Richard Lafontaine, of Etobicoke, Ontario, as a member of the Standards Council of Canada to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years; and designation of Richard Lafontaine as President of the Standards Council of Canada to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, effective October 4, 1994, in the place of Georges Archer, whose term has expired.
Attachments
